email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Hope you're doing well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. Cargo size is 150,000 MT on CIF terms. Starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT. Laycan is 1-5 Dec. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Maria Santos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for the quote. USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you offer a better rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 18.00 is better, but we’re aiming for USD 17.50. Also, can we adjust the laycan to 3-7 Dec?

Cheers,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 17.50 is possible with the adjusted laycan of 3-7 Dec. Please confirm.

Best,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN STAR
- Cargo: 150,000 MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 3-7 Dec
- Freight: USD 17.50 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day, pro rata
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best,
Maria
